text: Dhugumatti, isaan (Aa’ishaa iratti) soba fidan garee isin irraa ta’aniidhaIsa isiniif hamtuu hin se'inaaInumaa inni isiniif caalaadhaNama isaan irraa ta’e hundaafuu, hamtuu irraa wantuma inni carraaqqatetu isaaf jiraIsa isaan irraa (soba) guddaa baadhate immoo adabbii guddaa ta'etu isaaf jira
